patthana16.59:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.59:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.59:4.3: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho nasāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.59:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.59:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe ….
patthana16.59:5.4: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.59:5.6: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
